description.zh-cn: 中国电气自动化专家，曾任中共天津市委常委、第八届全国人大代表、常委会委员。
description.en: A Chinese expert in electrical automation, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee, a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress, and a member of its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，杨竞衡的出生地。
description.en: A province in China, the birthplace of Yang Jingheng.

en: Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 杨竞衡曾任中共天津市委常委。
description.en: Yang Jingheng once served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee.

position.en: Delegate to the 8th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 杨竞衡是第八届全国人大代表。
description.en: Yang Jingheng was a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 杨竞衡是第八届全国人大常委会委员。
description.en: Yang Jingheng was a member of the Standing Committee of the 8th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类，杨竞衡是浙江大学校友。
description.en: According to the category, Yang Jingheng is an alumnus of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类，杨竞衡是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the category, Yang Jingheng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类，杨竞衡是中国自动化学会常务理事，并曾任第四届、第五届、第六届理事会成员。
description.en: According to the category, Yang Jingheng was an executive director of the Chinese Association of Automation, and served as a member of its 4th, 5th, and 6th councils.
